content:
Dr. Takayanagi is a Lead Data Scientist at Boston Consulting Group and Visiting Associate Professor in Center for Design-Oriented AI Education and Research at Tokushima University. He is also the co-founder of HOXO-M Inc. His research interests include statistical and data science, machine learning theory, theoretical physics, and its applications of related fields.
Feel free to send me a direct message on Twitter, LinkedIn or get in touch via email.
  Download my resum√©.
summary: Dr. Takayanagi is a Lead Data Scientist at Boston Consulting Group and Visiting Associate Professor in Center for Design-Oriented AI Education and Research at Tokushima University. He is also the co-founder of HOXO-M Inc.
title: Shinichi Takayanagi, Ph.D.
